page.title: 13APPLIANCES IN OUR HOMES
page.content: Living in our houses is made easier by the invention and use of many varied machines, mostly powered by electricity. Food preparation may involve hobs and ovens, microwaves, electric kettles,slow-cookers, electric frying pans, mixers, blenders, slicers, refrigerators, freezers, percolaters and dishwashers. For cleanliness, washing machines, tumble driers, vacuum cleaners, electric polishers and irons are used. Sewing machines are used for making and mending clothes and household furnishings.Hair driers, curlers, electric toothbrushes and electric razors may be found in the bathroom. Telephones, typewriters, computers, word processors assist in communication and work at home. Out-of-doors powered lawn mowers, hedge-cutters and trimmers are used.
